import React,{useState,useContext} from 'react' style={ backgroundImage:"data:image/jpeg;base64,"} const Context_data=React.createContext(); //const url="https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts" const Hooks=()=> { const [empdata]=useState({ id:101, name:'kavya', location:'Hyderabad', salary:97452 }); return (<>

Employee

  • {empdata.id}
  • {empdata.name}
  • {empdata.location}
  • {empdata.salary}
